@/@init
sname
init
sparams
value
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
var fieldsets = Ext.query('div.x-fieldset-body');
for (var i = 0; i < fieldsets.length; i++) {
    var cheight = fieldsets[i].scrollHeight;
    var field = Ext.get(fieldsets[i]);
    field.applyStyles({height: cheight});
}
#$@text#$@
